summary: A light shield based on the oval design used by many of the roman auxiliaries.
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][size=4]Roman Auxiliary [/size][size=4]Shield
[/size][/u][/center][size=4]This mod has been included in my larger mod "Armory of the Legion" found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61099/?]here[/url]. I recommend using "Armory of the Legion" instead of this mod because it contains all my work so far.The re-placer version of this mod can still be used in combination with Armory of the Legion.[/size]

This mod adds a new shield similar to the ones used by the ancient roman auxiliaries. The auxiliaries were recruited by the provinces captured and controlled by the Romans. The city icon for "Solitude" shows that the owner of the shield was recruited from the province of "Haafingar".

//INSTALLATION//

The shield comes in two versions...

Normal - Adds a new shield named "Auxiliary Shield". Craftable in the "Iron" section. I recommend this version for your character.
Replacer - Replaces the imperial shield. Use this if you want imperials to carry the shield.

Both versions can be installed at the same time. When installing the second NMM will ask if you want to "upgrade" click no and install manually.

//TOOLS USED//

3ds Max 2012
Photoshop CS6
Nifskope
CK

//NOTES//

[list][*][size=2]Diffuse texture is 2k[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Normal map is 2k[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Environment map is 512 x 512[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
A guide on how to replace vanilla meshes and textures is available in the downloads section.[/size][size=2]
I give permission to modify the files and re-upload as long as you acknowledge and provide a link to the original (this).[/size]
author: RenderLegion
